channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Graffiti on street sign on pedestrian crossing, 1st September
item.description:
Graffiti with annoying 'oops' that is around Anerley. This is on the yellow sign on the pedestrian crossing next to the pub on the corner. Please can this be removed. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
There is a recurring issue with fly tipping and littering on the corner of Darnley Road and Mare Street, near Domino’s and Lime Bike parking bay. This is causing bad smells, flies & pests ripping open the bags and spreading the waste.

item.title: Defective Pedestrian Crossing, 1st September
item.description:
The crossing right by Keil locksmith Bellegrove Rd going into Welling High St. The black /white stripes across the road barely visible. This makes crossing illegally marked & decent solicitor will get any motorist acquitted of an offence at this crossing. I will note I have brought this to your attention if any accidents occur
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 117, Bellegrove Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Damage - pole leaning / equipment detached from pole/facing the wrong direction

item.title: Urgent spillage removal required for disabled tenant, 1st September
item.description:
Dear Team, I am an Environment Champion and have just clean around 26 Waverley Road. I was informed that the resident is sick/disabled. The bin is overflowing on the pavement/road with an extremely bad smell. I would be grateful if the bin is collected as the rubbish seems to be clinical waste which is unhygienic to the public. Thank you in advance for your cooperation on this matter. Kind regards, Nina

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Waverley Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
